title: Screen GIF 2018.2 + Portable + patch - Crackingpatching
description:
Description: 
Screen GIF 2018.2 + Portable + Repack Screen GIF is a program from David Esperalta that will allow you to record the necessary part of the desktop and save the result in the animation, that is, in the picture of the GIF format, which so often became used in social networks. You can start recording, stop, pause, open the options window, view help and perform other data that is not of interest by means of "hot keys". 
Features: Easy to useSmall and convenient GUIF editorSetting the quality of pictures on the output Ability to adjust the scale of animation 
In general, this all, unpretentious development, does not require much knowledge for the work, even without Russian support it is easy to understand, in general, you can run and use the default settings, you will not experience any problems. 

Developer: David Esperalta 
License: ShareWare - for you free of charge 
Language: English - Russian version and Russifier not available 
Size: 3 + 2 MB 
OS: Windows 

How to Install: 
1). Instructions are included in ReadMe.txt if needed. 
2). Thats all, Done & enjoy
